title: Save the Brown Wolf (1)
description:
Did you see that?

Those were Brown Wolves. They are peaceful animals.

A Brown Wolf can turn nearby wolves, boars and even some orcs to our side. But, they cannot win in a fight against a Red Wolf, so they must be protected.

This Brown Wolf is about to die! Select the Red Wolf that stands directly next to a Brown Wolf using the adjacent sibling CSS selector:

element1 + element2
